Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance to me, but I believe it could also bring great value to your collection or endeavors. Considering its rarity and quality, I am offering it to you at a special price of $15000. I trust this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange a viewing. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
